security: This document contains sensitive personal information, including names and social security numbers, of individuals employed by the Select Committee on Assassinations. Disclosing this information would violate privacy and could expose individuals to identity theft or other harm.
summary: This document is a payroll certification for the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations, detailing employee names, social security numbers, annual salaries, and gross pay for the accounting period of January 1, 1977, to January 31, 1977.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a U.S. House of Representatives Financial Management System payroll certification for the Select Committee on Assassinations for the accounting period from January 1, 1977, to January 31, 1977. It lists employee names, social security numbers, annual salaries, gross pay, and appointment dates. The document also includes an office payroll summary with the number of employees, appropriation total, and expenditures for the month. Richard A. Sprague is listed as the Chief Counsel and Director, and the document includes a certification that the listed employees performed their assigned duties and have no relationship to a current member of Congress.
title: Payroll Certification
